医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
痴呆症患者的预期寿命和入住疗养院的情况今天《英国医学杂志》对最新证据进行了系统回顾，女性被诊断患有痴呆症的人的平均预期寿命为 60 岁时的 9 岁到 85 岁时的 4.5 岁，男性的平均预期寿命为 6.5 岁到 2 岁多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Life-expectancy-and-nursing-home-admission-in-people-with-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Life-expectancy-and-nursing-home-admission-in-people-with-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9372ec86-becb-4f5c-bf74-65edf3769849 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 02:46:33 -0500 Life expectancy and nursing home admission in people with dementia
评估化学品对儿童健康影响的新框架儿童联盟专家组在《新英格兰医学杂志》上发表的一份报告称，各国必须开始像当前保护处方药的系统一样严格地测试和监管化学品和化学产品，否则儿童慢性病发病率可能会上升。环境健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/A-new-framework-for-assessing-the-impact-of-chemicals-on-child-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/A-new-framework-for-assessing-the-impact-of-chemicals-on-child-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42271adf-705c-442b-8f47-a5a6d0f4d993 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 02:41:29 -0500 A new framework for assessing the impact of chemicals on child health
探索自闭症人群的住房与健康之间的联系经济实惠且稳定的住房对于改善人一生的健康至关重要。包括自闭症患者在内的残疾人在需要住房援助的人群中占很大比例。然而，自闭症患者的住房和健康的交叉点在很大程度上是未知的，因为公共住房和公共卫生的数据没有联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Exploring-the-link- Between-housing-and-health-in-autistic-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Exploring-the-link- Between-housing-and-health-in-autistic-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c22992a5-ea2e-43df-8952-faf65b76695a Thu, 09 Jan 2025 02:35:22 -0500 Exploring the link between housing and health in autistic populations
变异的功能表征可改善癌症风险评估和治疗由 Mayo Clinic 综合癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项多机构国际研究的结果显着增进了对 BRCA2 基因遗传改变的理解，BRCA2 基因是遗传性癌症风险的关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Functional-charging-of-variants-improves-cancer-risk-assessment-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Functional-charging-of-variants-improves-cancer-risk-assessment-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=665093e1-c23b-4b30-8f97-ae948338798a Thu, 09 Jan 2025 02:25:01 -0500 Functional characterization of variants improves cancer risk assessment and treatment
揭示致病突变的分子机制根据今天发表在《自然》杂志上的一项关于人类蛋白质变体的大规模研究，大多数通过将一种氨基酸替换为另一种氨基酸而导致疾病的突变是通过使蛋白质不稳定来实现的。不稳定的蛋白质更有可能错误折叠和降解，导致它们停止工作或在细胞内积聚有害量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Unraveling-the-molecular-mechanisms-of-disease-causing-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Unraveling-the-molecular-mechanisms-of-disease-causing-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68a631bd-7629-4ed8-b8fa-fa808ce76c1b Thu, 09 Jan 2025 02:13:16 -0500 Unraveling the molecular mechanisms of disease-causing mutations
单胺神经递质成为大脑生理学的建筑师西奈山和纪念斯隆凯特琳癌症中心之间的合作，揭示了单胺神经递质（例如血清素、多巴胺和现在的组胺）如何通过这些单胺与组蛋白（核心 DNA 包装）的化学键合来帮助调节大脑生理和行为。我们细胞的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Monoamine-neurotransmitters-emerge-as-architects-of-brain-physiology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Monoamine-neurotransmitters-emerge-as-architects-of-brain-physiology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=281d92a8-aaab-48e9-a9b0-00235f1c0fc4 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 01:38:59 -0500 Monoamine neurotransmitters emerge as architects of brain physiology
AI 驱动的葡萄糖分析：GPT-4 带来了希望，但仍有改进的空间GPT-4 展示了其在分析连续血糖监测数据、提供准确指标和摘要方面的潜力，同时突出了糖尿病护理中需要改进的领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/AI-powered-glucose-analysis-GPT-4-offers-promise-with-room-for-refinement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/AI-powered-glucose-analysis-GPT-4-offers-promise-with-room-for-refinement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2dd394ff-b8de-4859-8310-65779cfeaca0 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 23:51:00 -0500 AI-powered glucose analysis: GPT-4 offers promise with room for refinement
儿童早期感染会带来长期健康风险儿童早期感染会显着增加儿童后期严重感染和抗生素使用的风险，凸显了早期预防和监测的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Early-infections-in-childhood-drive-long-term-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Early-infections-in-childhood-drive-long-term-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edd02cea-4ad5-49d4-9b56-1a899571c5de Wed, 08 Jan 2025 23:30:00 -0500 Early infections in childhood drive long-term health risks
科学家发现启动细胞自噬的关键因素我们的细胞随时都在进行回收：在一个称为自噬的过程中，不再需要的细胞成分被膜包围并分解成基本的构建块。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Scientists-uncover-key-factors-for-starting-autophagy-in-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Scientists-uncover-key-factors-for-starting-autophagy-in-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e9dd959-13d4-4299-aace-bac4715a01d2 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 22:59:00 -0500 Scientists uncover key factors for starting autophagy in cells
间歇性禁食在控制肥胖和心血管健康方面显示出希望由格拉纳达大学 (UGR)、纳瓦拉公立大学 (UPNA) 和 CIBER 领导的科学家团队表明，间歇性禁食（减少摄入时间并延长每天禁食时间）是一种有效的方法。一种减肥方法并改善患有肥胖问题的人的心血管健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Intermittent-fasting-shows-promise-in-managing-obesity-and-cardioangio-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Intermittent-fasting-shows-promise-in-managing-obesity-and-cardioangio-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef4316b3-6575-41ae-974e-b7e3f388578c Wed, 08 Jan 2025 22:44:22 -0500 Intermittent fasting shows promise in managing obesity and cardiovascular health
